/* 관리자 직책 히스토리 관리 > 조회 */
SELECT employee_id , (SELECT e.first_name||' '||e.last_name FROM hr.employees e WHERE e.employee_id = jh.employee_id) AS manager_name , start_date , end_date , job_id , (SELECT j.job_title FROM hr.jobs j WHERE j.job_id = jh.job_id) AS job_title , department_id , (SELECT d.department_name FROM hr.departments d WHERE d.department_id = jh.department_id) AS department_name FROM hr.job_history jh WHERE employee_id = #{employeeId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
